Idea: Extra Kind Hour!

I am not a big drinker, but I do often get aggressive and unkind in the evening! A beer would not help my cause, but being extra kind and receiving extra-kindness in return would be great. This is especially true during typical happy hour hours. Soâ€¦

All of March - Extra Kind Hour (6pm-10pm, Monday-Friday)
